title: r/AmITheA**hole for Having My Dogs Attack My Neighbor's Kids?
description: r/AmITheA**hole OP lives next to a couple of young boys and their hands-off, entitled parents. The boys are constantly messing around on OP's property, and he even catches them trying to break into his house! Eventually, OP gets sick of the harassment and gives his dogs a command to chase the boys. The kids run away in terror and OP calls his dogs back -- no harm done. Does this make him the butthole?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
